description:
EscrowEchidnaTest.deposit(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#73-83) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(DaiLike(dai).balanceOf(address(this)) == add(thisBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#79)

EscrowEchidnaTest.deposit(uint256) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#73-83) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(DaiLike(dai).balanceOf(address(escrow)) == add(escrowBalance,wad)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#81)

Reentrancy in EscrowEchidnaTest.constructor() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#49-60):
	External calls:
	- dai = create.deploy() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#51)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- escrow = new L1Escrow() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#53)
	- gate1 = new L1Gateway(TokenLike(dai),address(gate2),address(messenger1),address(escrow)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#57)
	- gate2 = new L2Gateway(address(messenger2),address(oDai)) (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#56)
	- messenger1 = new MockMessenger() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#54)
	- messenger2 = new MockMessenger() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#55)
	- oDai = new Dai() (contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#52)
markdown:

	- [gate2 = new L2Gateway(address(messenger2),address(oDai))](contracts/test/EscrowEchidnaTest.sol#L56)
